24246.name: AWS Amplify Theme Editor
24246.description: The AWS Amplify Theme Editor gives customers using the Amplify UI library the ability to customize their Figma design files to match their theme object. A Theme is a structured collection of design decisions that change the appearance of a UI library. An Amplify UI theme is a structured object of design tokens, breakpoints, and overrides.

24012.name: Word magnet generator
24012.description:
Turn any text in your FigJam or design file into a set of fridge magnets. Great for writers' block or a team poetry writing jam.


How to use:


  1. Select anything on the canvas with text‚Äîany number of text boxes, frames, stickies, shapes, etc.
  2. Run the plugin
  3. Get fridge magnets made from your text! Move around and arrange as you please.

24337.name: Move selection to another page
24337.release_notes:
Add prompt:
The target contains original components, please copy before moving!

24584.name: Label Sides
24584.description:
This is a simple plugin to help you quickly label your slides by number.


How to:

  1. Select the numbering text layers in all your slides
  2. Run the plugin
  3. Optional: set your start number, concat text, and total number of slides
  4. Click "Label Slides"
  5. Done
24584.release_notes:
‚úÖTurn on support for FigJam
üêûBug fix on not showing concat and total number with UI

24137.name: XamlStyles
24137.description:
This plug let you extract all the colors from a design file as XAML resources that are directly embeddable in XAML-compatible application frameworks like WPF, Avalonia, Xamarin Forms, MAUI etc.

XamlStyles supports both solid (as SolidColorBrush) and gradient colors (only LinearGradientBrush), including variations.

23862.name: Scrapbook It
23862.description: Use this plugin with this template file to quickly generate a scrapbook! Gather up some photos, pop them in, and share your 'handmade' scrapbook with your parents, grandparents, or team!

24398.name: CI HUB Connector
24398.description:
Add images/text to your designs directly from wherever they are, directly in Figma.

Access Stock Images or use your workflow for approval. 

Share with your Team. in Dropbox or Google Drive and more.

And never leave Figma. 


Supports already: Adobe CC Library, Adobe Lightroom, Adobe Stock, Adstream, Aprimo, Box, Brandfolder, Brandmaster, Brandworkz, Bynder, Celum, Censhare, Cliplister, Dash, Dropbox, Eyebase, Fadel, Fotoware, Gelato, Getty Images, Google Drive, Google Photos, Imageshop, Istock, Keepeek, Myview, OneDrive, Opentext, Picturepark, Pimcore, Pixelboxx, Purered, Sharedien, Sharepoint, Shutterstock, SiteFusion, Unsplash, Veeva, Webdam, WIden, Workfront


This is not an official plugin created by Google or Microsoft or any other‚Ä¢ It is simply created with ‚ù§Ô∏è by CI HUB


STEP 1:

Install the Plugin


STEP 2:

Setup your CI HUB ID at https://ci-hub.com


STEP 3:

Connect to where your Files are and start using.


--------


Visit our CI HUB Academy to learn how to save time in Figma: https://ci-hub.com/academy/


--------


Free Trial, and Subscription Payment:

All first-time users receive a 30-day free trial upon registration/creation of a CI HUB ID.

Payment via credit card is required upon the conclusion of the trial period to continue use. VISIT https://ci-hub.com for all the latest pricing and details. Corporate plans are available on request at sales@ci-hub.com.


Important Notes:

To use the CI HUB Connector to connect to one of the offered third party systems, you may need a login/user account with the selected system. The availability and/or the right to connect to the third-party system is not part of the CI HUB Connector or the CI HUB Services. To use the third-party system, there may be additional cost and/or agreements with the provider of the third-party system needed. CI HUB reserves the right to remove the third-party system from the list of avail. systems or add new third party systems at any time and without notice. To use CI HUB Connector, a full connection to the Internet is required at all times. (Corporate setups with Proxy or Firewalls on request)


To see Demo-Video, Tutorials and more go to https://ci-hub.com/ci-hub-how-to-tutorial/ or visit our Youtube Channel.


We are always here to help you! Let us know any issue, suggestion or feedback: support@ci-hub.com

24093.name: Mark the page
24093.description: View the marked pages and quickly enter the marked page!

24397.name: QPallete Linter Beta
24397.description:
Plugin for checking the correct structure and styles of form layouts that are based on the qpalette design system


The plugin is based on deeply reworked sources of

Design Lint ‚Äì Figma

24582.name: Trello for Figma
24582.description:
Import your Trello board directly into Figma


Dynamic elements and "drag and drop" included.


Get started with these three easy steps:

  1. Click the link in the plugin to authorise your Trello account and get an authorisation Token.
  2. Paste the token in the Authorisation token field.
  3. Enter the name of the Trello board you want to import in the board name field. Note: the name of the board must be exact, including spacing and spelling.


The plugin is open source, check out the code here:

https://github.com/thomasbrettell/trello-for-figma-plugin


This is an unofficial Trello plugin, not affiliated with Atlassian

24601.name: XR Tools: Curved UI Generator
24601.description:
A quick and easy way to generate curved UI planes for VR mock ups.


VR UI Automatically scales and adjusts any content to create 3D surfaces. Currently supports rotation, zoom, FOV and curve amount.
24601.release_notes: Bug fixes and camera reset mode.

24575.name: Icon Pixel Preview
24575.description: View the pixel fidelity render when designing your icons.

24520.name: Text Editor: edit all texts in one place
24520.description:
In our design, texts are always in different layers. You needed multiple clicks to edit it.

But now, we made all texts in one place when you select them.

Faster and easier, just like using a plain text editor.


Any questions or suggestions, contact me: nowork.app@gmail.com
